data.name: Felgrand Dragon
data.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned except from the Graveyard, and only if it was sent there from the field. If this card is Special Summoned: Target 1 monster in your Graveyard; this card gains ATK equal to that monster's Level x 200.

card_sets.set_name: Rise of the Dragon Lords Structure Deck
Rise of the True Dragons Structure Deck
